title: nik268279
author: nik268279
content: Why is it believed that melt water is the most useful on an empty stomach? I can't wait for the ice cubes to melt, it's easier for me to drink a glass of filtered water in the morning, is it really worse than melt water?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: It is very important to drink a glass of cold water because all the organs and cells in the human body need water to properly function. Many people may not be aware but the water in our bodies helps us as it delivers oxygen to every part of our bodies. More then 60% of the body is made from water, which is why we need to drink about a gallon of water every day. Our bodies would not survive without water and our kidneys along with organs of the body would begin to fail. Dehydration is also not good for our bodies. Dry skin can damage skin cells and cause a different types of skin disorders. The many benefits of drinking water should be considered when selecting your next beverage when going out to eat. Having a cold glass of water can be the difference between that morning's coffee or coca cola. It will be better for your body, with less sugar which means less fat.
